entry.title: 数学公式渲染及代码测试
entry.content:
这篇post是用来测试网站对数学公式和代码的渲染情况。 数学公式渲染Augmented matrix$$ \left[ egin{array}{cc|c} 1&2&3\ 4&5&6\end{array} ight]$$ Sum of squares$$\sum_{i=0}^n i^2 =  rac{(n^2+n)(2n+1)}{6}$$ Maxwell’s equations$$ egin{align} 
abla 	imes \vec{\mathbf{B}} -\,  rac1c\,  rac{\partial\vec{\mathbf{E}}}{\partial t} & =  rac{4\pi}{c}\vec{\mathbf{j}} \ 
abla \cdot \vec{\mathbf{E}} & = 4 \pi ho \ 
abla 	imes \vec{\mathbf{E}}\, +\,  rac1c\,  rac{\partial\vec{\mathbf{B}}}{\partial t} & = \vec{\mathbf{0}} \ 
abla \cdot \vec{\mathbf{B}} & = 0\end{align}$$ Tables$$ egin{array}{c|lcr}n & 	ext{Left} & 	ext{Center} & 	ext{Right} \\hline1 & 0.24 & 1 & 125 \2 & -1 & 189 & -8 \3 & -20 & 2000 & 1+10i\end{array}$$ Highlight an equation$$  box[yellow,5px,border:2px solid red]{e^x=\lim_{n	o\infty} \left( 1+ rac{x}{n} ight)^n\qquad (1)}$$ In-line mathematicsFinally, while display equations look good for a page of samples, the ability to mix math and text in a paragraph is also important. This expression $\sqrt{3x-1}+(1+x)^2$ is an example of an inline equation. As you see, MathJax equations can be used this way as well, without unduly disturbing the spacing between lines. 代码测试常用的编程语言有Matlab、R、Stata、Java、Python、Bash和SQL。下面分别对这几种语言进行测试。 Matlab123456789t = 0:.02:3.14;y = zeros(10,length(t));x = zeros(size(t));for k = 1:2:19 x = x + sin(k*t)/k; y((k+1)/2,:) = x;endplot(y(1:2:9,:)')title('The building of a square wave: Gibbs'' effect') Java12345public class FullStackException extends RuntimeException { public FullStackException(String err) { super(err); }} Python12for i in range(1,10): print(i) Bash12cd Desktop/mkdir hexo SQL12SELECT studentID, name FROM uniDatabase Rinstall.packages("caTools") # install external package library(caTools) # external package providing write.gif function Note需要注意的是：由于Markdown和$\LaTeX{}$的语法不一致问题，在Markdown中需要使用反斜杠和星字符的时候，注意转义问题。如，在表示换行时需要四个反斜杠“\“。 以上对代码渲染只做了一些简单测试，现在Markdown对Stata这种轻量级的编程语言还没有提供支持，因此在上面没有给出Stata代码，希望以后能找到解决方案。还有就是目前还没有找到如何能够一键复制代码的办法，在以后po文中会给出这个方便的功能。 Reference MathJax basic tutorial and quick reference 解决 MathJax 与 Markdown 的冲突 Mathjax与LaTex公式简介
